title: Dynamic transformation of active sites in energy and environmental catalysis
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02365J, Review Article

Hao Zhang, Lei Chen, Feng Dong, Zhiwen Lu, Enmin Lv, Xinglong Dong, Huanxin Li, Zhongyong Yuan, Xinwen Peng, Shihe Yang, Jieshan Qiu, Zhengxiao Guo, Zhenhai Wen
Active sites play a pivotal role in photo/electrocatalysis, particularly in the transition from fossil fuels to clean, efficient and renewable energy sources.
